paper_abstract: In a multi-sample experiment, we model the parameters of an equal load-sharing system by means of link functions in sequential order statistics models, and then discuss the estimation of these parameters based on a given link function. Different link functions are examined along with the corresponding maximum likelihood estimators, and their properties are studied both analytically and through Monte Carlo simulations.
paper_title: Modeling Parameters of a Load-Sharing System Through Link Functions in Sequential Order Statistics Models and Associated Inference
